segments.text: Poor Danny . You are so enfeebled !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . No big deal . Just a common cold .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mom called just now saying that she and Dad will be back later . Do you want to speak to them on phone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . You can never count on the grown-ups when there is something .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Whatever . Have a drink of water .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on , sister . This is the seventh glass already .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe later . I think we have a medicine-kit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Probably on the of the cabinet . I'll go and get it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Be careful . Now I have no one but you to depend on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , here it is . Patulin . Oh , no !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Keep lying down . The matter is that all the medicine here is past expiration .
segments.speaker: S1
